plot: Charlie, a poet, hasn't had much luck with women, but then he meets Harriet, the girl of his dreams.. or is it his nightmares. Charlie begins to suspect that Harriet is Ms X, a woman who marries then kills her husbands.

f.role: Black Widow: Mike Meyers parodies the trope — his character believes he is dating the mysterious "Mrs. X."  She's not. Turns out her sister was an insane Clingy Jealous Girl who murdered all of the poor girl's previous husbands (she thought they had all just up and left her).

Mike Myers parodies the trope in So I Married an Axe Murderer — his character believes he is dating the mysterious "Mrs. X."  She's not. Turns out her sister was an insane Clingy Jealous Girl who murdered all of the poor girl's previous husbands (she thought they had all just up and left her).

name: So I Married an Axe Murderer
